From: "Logo morph" <logomorph@...>

::Shadow Wing::

"No, I didn't know him all that well. We were mearly comrads in arms. But I 
feel a pain anytime a comrad is lost.  I am sorry that any life was lost in 
battle. Especially when it was lost for no realy reason.  THis whole war is 
senseless. A biproduct of war is death.  And death pains me." She looked up 
at Lunarpine. "I didn't know him well as a friend.  He was a good commander 
though.  He will be missed." She wiped her eyes and stood up. "But we have 
no time to morn his passing now.  We will morn when we have time to do so.  
Right now, we must concentrate on the living and to keep us living." she 
smiled. "Someday, this will be nothing but an unpleasent memory. I just hope 
that day is soon." She walked inside the ship.

-----original message----
From:   <cyberwolf4@p...>
Date: Sat Jul 1, 2000 1:24am
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars



Lunarpine sees Shadow wings sorrow, and wishes he could change it.
Her spark was genuinly good, it's a ahame to have it soiled by war.

In an attempt to comfort his new friend he comes closer

"Did you know him well? Was he another freind of yours?"

He tries, even though he knows he can't help her hurting.
